urls.notes: On Running sneakers - tests name='og:image' meta tag format
AGOLDE shorts - tests Shopbop sale pricing with EXTRA10 code
Jenni Kayne shirt - tests high-end designer on Shopbop
alice + olivia dress - tests faux leather product descriptions

instructions: Test catalog with 5 working product URLs from Shopbop. Run 'npm run test:scraper' to test all URLs.

incompatibleSites.Nordstrom: Client-side rendered (React/SPA) - returns skeleton HTML without product data
incompatibleSites.TheOutnet: Blocks automated requests with ETIMEDOUT errors
incompatibleSites.Saks: Not tested - likely has similar bot protection
incompatibleSites.NeimanMarcus: Not tested - likely has similar bot protection
